incompatible_with: Commercial licenses that do not allow GPL compatibility

compatibility.notes: The GPL-2.0-with-bison-exception allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but any modifications to the GPL-covered code must remain under GPL. The Bison exception specifically allows the use of Bison-generated files without imposing the GPL on the entire project.

incompatible_with: Commercial licenses that do not allow GPL compatibility

key_requirements: You must include the original copyright notice and license when redistributing the Bison parser skeleton or any derived work.
You must disclose the source code of the modified version if you distribute it.
license.name: GPL-2.0-with-bison-exception
obligations: If you modify or redistribute the Bison parser skeleton, you must either keep the Bison Exception or remove it, which will then subject the skeleton to the GPL terms.
